sentences.sContent: This course examines computers anthropologically, as meaningful tools revealing the social and cultural orders that produce them.
sentences.sContent_eng: This course examines computers anthropologically, as meaningful tools revealing the social and cultural orders that produce them.
sentences.sCn: 本课程系以人类学的观点探讨电脑，显示过去生产电脑的社会和文化秩序。
